channel.title: Do you like rap?
channel.description:
The title says all. I personally don't like rap.It's rubbish for god sakes. Well,just post your opinion...
You may think differently,but thats my OPINION.
Edit: 3 years later, my views have changed and I now also enjoy old rap such as Tupac and Biggie.

@MastrChief wrote:

haxed:

All of you. Look back on your posts if you made any grammar or spelling mistakes leave the forums. Because if you’re not spelling it wrong on purpose you piss people off. (more than you would if you spelt it wrong on purpose). How can you argue if you can’t even use the English language properly.

Please clarify what we spelled wrong.

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:488, topic:697”][quote author=cheese939 link=topic=518.msg1581193#msg1581193 date=1183976997]
Not all rap is crap, its the wannabe gangsters rap that gives rap a bad image
[/quote]

They’re all I see on the rare occasions I pass through channels and watch MTV(2) for 5 minutes.

They bitch about racial profiling in a few of their songs yet they rap in most of their others about how much of a gangster/drug dealer they are.[/quote]

For example, thats why mainstream rap has ruined rap.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

Schizzo:

I like some rap music. I listen to Jay-Z, Nas, 2Pac, Lupe Fiasco, and Kanye West (to name a few). It’s fine if people don’t like it, it’s just their opinion and taste ion music. I just dislike when they don’t like it because of some stupid stereotype that they have like: “i cud lern 2 rap in a week lolol” or “rap iz fer stoopid ppl”. If the type of music doesn’t really fit your lifestyle at all or anything, then it’s understandable that you wouldn’t like it. Just don’t be an idiot about stating your opinion.

tyvm! and i wana see ne one that would rap in 2 weeks i’ve been rappin for bout 2 yrsnow? and i’m still not that good not that bad…

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like rap?

item.description:
@Liaramongall wrote:

Yeah. I know how ya feel on that. People dont like punk because they think its about destroying things and fighting. BUT ITS NOT! Its about unity and peace and (in most cases) anti violence. But see there are just those few bands that give us a bad name…

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I like some rap music. I listen to Jay-Z, Nas, 2Pac, Lupe Fiasco, and Kanye West (to name a few). It’s fine if people don’t like it, it’s just their opinion and taste ion music. I just dislike when they don’t like it because of some stupid stereotype that they have like: “i cud lern 2 rap in a week lolol” or “rap iz fer stoopid ppl”. If the type of music doesn’t really fit your lifestyle at all or anything, then it’s understandable that you wouldn’t like it. Just don’t be an idiot about stating your opinion.

Read full topic

Go listen to some 80s-90s rap

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:473, topic:697”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=518.msg1545420#msg1545420 date=1182872267]
No thanks, I could cares less what kind of oppression black people have had.

My family didn’t migrate here until the 1910’s, so thats not my history, and any black man saying I owe him for slavery is stupid.

I’m a tad bit racist, but only because of many past experiences with black people. I’ve tried defending them, and I got screwed over.
[/quote]

No, i am not saying that.

I am saying in the 80’s - 90’s, when the black panthers were around, people like 2pac was in the black panthers and by rapping, you get millions of people listening to you, What a great way to put your message across?

New rap is trying to copy the old stuff but failing badly giving the opinion what you have now.

People like 50 cent, just in it for the money, noticed tupacs records still sell the most in the rap /hip-hop industry and decide to get some remixs and release.

He says in one of the remix’s “untill makaveli returns its all eyez on me”.

Makaveli being one of tupacs aliases, all eyez on me being one of tupacs last songs.
People like 50 should be dead, not all the good rappers.

Like i said, im not trying to make you improve your opinion on blacks or anything like that, im just saying before you make comments like you did then listen to were rap came from, listen to the real stuff not the shit thats giving it a bad name now.[/quote]

People like 50 Cent kill it for me, so I haven’t really bothered listening to anything other than Eminem.

I have listened to one of Tupac’s songs, I liked it…

Other than that, I stay away from it.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:472, topic:697”]No thanks, I could cares less what kind of oppression black people have had.

My family didn’t migrate here until the 1910’s, so thats not my history, and any black man saying I owe him for slavery is stupid.

I’m a tad bit racist, but only because of many past experiences with black people. I’ve tried defending them, and I got screwed over.[/quote]

No, i am not saying that.

I am saying in the 80’s - 90’s, when the black panthers were around, people like 2pac was in the black panthers and by rapping, you get millions of people listening to you, What a great way to put your message across?

New rap is trying to copy the old stuff but failing badly giving the opinion what you have now.

People like 50 cent, just in it for the money, noticed tupacs records still sell the most in the rap /hip-hop industry and decide to get some remixs and release.

He says in one of the remix’s “untill makaveli returns its all eyez on me”.

Makaveli being one of tupacs aliases, all eyez on me being one of tupacs last songs.
People like 50 should be dead, not all the good rappers.

Like i said, im not trying to make you improve your opinion on blacks or anything like that, im just saying before you make comments like you did then listen to were rap came from, listen to the real stuff not the shit thats giving it a bad name now.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like rap?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:470, topic:697”]Only rap or hip hop or w/e you want to call it is Eminem’s music.

Otherwise, its crap. Just a bunch of black people who talk about committing crimes and shit and hating white people for accusing them of what they sing about.[/quote]

Heh, i suggest you look into black history in america, then listen to some of the 80’s and 90’s rap/hip hop before you judge rap on what shit it has become today.

Read full topic
